title: UK weather: Snow across England and Scotland in pictures
description: People share their photos of snow, as forecasters predict more flurries and ice for the coming days.

title: Bess spins England into strong position against India
description: Dom Bess advances England's chances of victory over India on day three of the first Test in Chennai, despite a sparkling knock from Rishabh Pant.

title: India floods: Scores missing after glacier smashes Uttarakhand dam
description: As many as 150 people are feared dead after floods are triggered in Uttarakhand.

title: Covid: Oxford jab protection against South Africa variant 'limited'
description: A small study suggests limited protection is offered against mild disease caused by the variant, AstraZeneca said.

title: Singing lockdown family back to eclipse viral song
description: After their Les Mis song adaptation during the first lockdown, they're back with a Bonnie Tyler track.

title: Myanmar coup: Tens of thousands protest for second day
description: Access appears to be partially restored as tens of thousands protest against the military coup.

title: GB's Evans wins first ATP title in Aussie Open warm-up
description: Dan Evans wins the first ATP title of his career by beating Canada's Felix Auger-Aliassime at an Australian Open warm-up event.

title: Covid: Workplace testing expanded and helping survivors speak again
description: Five things you need to know about the coronavirus pandemic this Sunday morning.

title: Leon Spinks: Ex-heavyweight champion who shocked Muhammad Ali dies aged 67
description: Leon Spinks, who beat Muhammad Ali to claim the world heavyweight title in 1978, dies at the age of 67.

title: Coronavirus doctor's diary: Why are some of Bradford's elderly refusing the vaccine?
description: About one in five people aged 80 or over in Bradford's Pakistani community has refused the Covid vaccine.

title: Covid: 'I'm chancing a holiday abroad in 2021 - why not?'
description: Many people are choosing "bucket-list" destinations for 2021, a travel consultant says.

title: The Papers: Vaccines at work and online giants 'face tax raid'
description: Plans to vaccinate under-50s at work and a possible tax on online retailers feature in the papers.

title: Covid testing expanded to more workplaces in England
description: Businesses with more than 50 staff are now able to access lateral flow tests, which give rapid results.

title: Iraq's Yazidi community buries 104 victims of IS massacre
description: The victims' remains had been exhumed from mass graves following Islamic State genocide in 2014.

title: Lib Dems: Uneasy party ponders long road back to EU
description: Ed Davey wants to focus on Covid but others seek more immediate answer to lingering Brexit question.

title: Covid-19: The speech therapists helping patients find their voices
description: Spending weeks on a ventilator means many are left unable to talk, eat or drink after coronavirus.

title: Keeping the faith: Christian chaplains in the time of Covid
description: Photographer Louise Haywood-Schiefer meets Christian chaplains around London and discovers how they are coping with the pandemic.

title: Lastminute.com failed to meet Covid refund deadline
description: Online travel agent Lastminute.com failed to refund Covid-hit holidays by January deadline.

title: Carlos Soria: The 81-year-old conquering the world's highest peaks
description: Carlos Soria is aiming to become the oldest person to have climbed the world's 14 highest peaks.

title: Down's syndrome: Mother says she wouldn't change a thing
description: Kassie Carlyle hopes her experience will give comfort to those having babies with Down's in lockdown.

title: FCA warning over 'risky' TikTok trading tips
description: Some TikTok creators have been giving investment advice in the wake of the GameStop frenzy.

title: Film awards 2021: The 21 contenders to watch
description: The films in the running for accolades over the coming months and where you'll be able to see them.

title: HIV: Two generations share their experiences
description: Two different generations consider what an HIV diagnosis meant for them.

title: Ex-beautician farmer raising mental health awareness
description: Vickie Gillespie realised her dad's struggle with mental health after she started working with him.

title: Match of the Day analysis: Edinson Cavani & Bruno Fernandes praised for 'genius' play
description: Match of the Day pundit Dion Dublin praises the "genius" play from Edinson Cavani for Manchester United's first goal and Bruno Fernandes for their second goal against Everton.
